When there's a difficult job at hand, you want to ensure that you can see it through to the end. Clark Defense Systems' ADP-mk4 heavy armor allows Marines to remain in active combat situations for a longer duration with more loadout options, while its powered frame provides near unfettered movement despite the protection it offers. This executive edition features a brushed chrome finish with an inlaid hexagonal pattern.
